message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us! Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to be flexible, I can't go lower than $9,500. It's still a great price considering the value you'll get from this product. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,200? I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure I can afford it.
